default: ½ a nectarine, stone removed, flesh chopped

steps: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan. Add the nectarine and chilli and fry together for 2-3 minutes.
Add the scallops to the frying pan and fry for one minute on each side.
To serve, arrange on the centre of a plate and garnish with parsley.
title: Seared scallops with nectarine and chilli
